content.json:
# AWS GuardDuty Security Overview

This workbook provides comprehensive visibility into AWS GuardDuty security findings ingested into Azure Sentinel.

---

parameters.name: AWSAccount
parameters.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| distinct AccountId
| sort by AccountId asc

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| summarize 
    TotalFindings = count(),
    CriticalFindings = countif(Severity >= 8.5),
    HighFindings = countif(Severity >= 7.0 and Severity < 8.5),
    MediumFindings = countif(Severity >= 4.0 and Severity < 7.0),
    LowFindings = countif(Severity < 4.0),
    UniqueAccounts = dcount(AccountId),
    UniqueRegions = dcount(Region),
    ActiveThreats = countif(not(Archived))
| extend 
    CriticalPercentage = round(todouble(CriticalFindings) / todouble(TotalFindings) * 100, 1),
    HighPercentage = round(todouble(HighFindings) / todouble(TotalFindings) * 100, 1)
content.title: Security Findings Summary

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| extend SeverityLevel = case(
    Severity >= 8.5, "Critical",
    Severity >= 7.0, "High", 
    Severity >= 4.0, "Medium",
    "Low"
)
| summarize Count = count() by SeverityLevel
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Findings by Severity Level

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| extend ThreatCategory = case(
    Type contains "Trojan", "Malware",
    Type contains "Backdoor", "Malware", 
    Type contains "Cryptocurrency", "CryptoCurrency",
    Type contains "Recon", "Reconnaissance",
    Type contains "Exfiltration", "DataExfiltration",
    Type contains "Impact", "Impact",
    "Other"
)
| summarize Count = count() by ThreatCategory
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Threat Categories

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| make-series Count = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated step 1h by AccountId
| render timechart
content.title: Findings Timeline by AWS Account

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| where Severity >= 7.0
| project TimeGenerated, FindingId, AccountId, Region, Severity, Type, Title, ResourceType, InstanceId, RemoteIpAddress, RemoteIpCountry
| sort by Severity desc, TimeGenerated desc
| take 50
content.title: High Severity Findings (Top 50)

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| where isnotempty(RemoteIpAddress)
| summarize 
    FindingCount = count(),
    UniqueTypes = dcount(Type),
    MaxSeverity = max(Severity),
    Countries = make_set(RemoteIpCountry)
    by RemoteIpAddress
| sort by FindingCount desc
| take 20
content.title: Top Malicious IP Addresses

content.query:
GuardDutyNormalized()
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AccountId in ({AWSAccount}) or '*' in ({AWSAccount})
| summarize 
    FindingCount = count(),
    AvgSeverity = avg(Severity),
    MaxSeverity = max(Severity),
    UniqueTypes = dcount(Type)
    by AccountId, Region
| sort by FindingCount desc
content.title: Findings by AWS Account and Region
